marklogic.body: Thanks. And I'm sorry if I over-reacted. I'm used to getting the stink-eye from people who think I'm just being an attention-whoring special snowflake for avoiding breads and pastas and such, it just really took me Off guard coming from someone I'd expect to understand. Â It's a sensitive topic, especially to those of us who have special dietary needs. It's actually quite crazy how the personal decision of what to eat brings so much judgment from others. I don't understand why that is, but it's obvious how that quickly becomes a sore Spot.
